root: ^Hi Kat, I'm back with the Pink flowers. I hope the ingredients haven't all gone bad.
^You're just on time Hanae. Our inventory can still be salvaged. Let me get these pink flowers to my parents so they can handle the food preparation.
^I know you're our first customer in a long time, but I'm making you work as well.
^I don't mind helping. It is my job after all. Anything to help with the future of the cafe and its yummy food.
^That's really sweet of you Hanae. You really are a good kid.
^You know what, to make it up to you, I'll give you double the Sweet and Savory Fish Stew. You can take one home with you if you want to.
^Thank you, I'm glad I was able to help out.
